overview: A rejected husband.  A beautiful stranger in peril.  A dangerous liaison.  For two couples enjoying a  spectacular Egyptian adventure, treachery and deception cruise the Nile along with them.
tagline: A rejected husband.  A beautiful stranger in peril.  A dangerous liaison.  For two couples enjoying a spectacular Egyptian adventure, treachery and deception cruise the Nile along with them.
title: An Egypt Affair
